name: a madman and his flower
description:
People say he is crazy because he has been holding his flower for years. He even traded his goats so he could nurture the flower more intensively.

He knows the flower and the flower knows him.

Only a mad man would do this kind of things.

However, the people who ridiculed him in the past are now reaping the rewards of his diligent work. The flower gives back to him and to the villages around him, providing life and abundance.


- Digital painting
- 4200 x 6200
- 300 DPI
